h:head.h:title: Improving Nutrition Status of Children Under 5 in Zambezia and Nampula Province Endline Survey

text.value: An area designated as either urban or rural
Cluster, final sampling unit, or sampling point
How did you identify the enumeration area?
EA identified with help of maps from INE
EA identified with help of local leaders/chiefs
Specify other approach taken to identify the enumeration area
Collect GPS coordinates of this location

Thank you for agreeing to answer this questionnaire. First, I would like to gather some information about the number of people in your family who normally live in this household. Next, I will ask you some basic information about all children less than 5 years of age that live in this household. Let's start with you, and then go on to all children less than five years old.
How many people make us this household, in other words, those that live and eat here?
Total number of children less than 5 years?
What is this child's FIRST name?
Do you know 's exact date of birth or do you have official documentation that shows 's exact date of birth?
Verify with official documentation whenever possible
How old where you when you gave birth to ?
Was born with low birth weight?
What is 's order of birth within siblings?
When was born, were there complications with the birth?
Don't know age = 88 No response/No answer = 99
What is your date of birth?
Age confirmed with the help of?
How many years of education have you completed?
Does your husband/partner actually live in this household?

Now I am going to ask you to tell me if yourself or another member of this household is part of an association here in the community and if you participated in any activities within the last 12 months.

Did you or another member of the household participate in a presentation here in your community in the last 12 months?
Probe about themes/content e.g., nutrition, hygiene practices, water treatment, sanitation, latrines, maternal and child health, vaccinations for mothers or children, mosquito nets, etc.
Specify the presentation you or another household member participate in
Do you use the information-orientations received within your household?
Did you or another member of this household participate in an active way in tasks or activities to promote community health?
Probe about construction or rehabilitation of the water points, hygiene and sanitation, community sensitisation about maternal and child health, mother and children vaccinations, mosquito net, etc.
Specify the health promotion activities you or another member of household participated in
